metadata.title: CVE-2024-37894 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Squid is a caching proxy for the Web supporting HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, and more.Due to an Out-of-bounds Write error when assigning ESI variables, Squid issusceptible to a Memory Corruption error. This error can lead to a Denialof Service attack.

criterions.comment: squid package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
